hero.description: Plendoor is revolutionizing architectural planning with AI-powered technology that turns any space into detailed, professional floor plans in minutes.

revolution.description: Traditional architectural planning is complex, expensive, and time-consuming. Plendoor changes everything.

benefits.savingDescription: Save up to 90% compared to traditional methods
benefits.fastDescription: Generate complete plans in minutes, not days
benefits.aiDescription: Advanced algorithms that learn and improve

steps.title: From Complex Process to
steps.oldDescription: Hiring architects, waiting weeks for measurements, revisions, and expensive software. Most people simply can't afford professional floor plans.
steps.newDescription: Just scan your space with your phone, and Plendoor's AI instantly generates accurate floor plans with professional detail and formatting.
steps.resultDescription: Professional-quality architectural plans accessible to everyone â€” homeowners, small businesses, interior designers, and real estate agents.

features.description: Plendoor combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to transform the way you create architectural plans.

scan.title: AI Room Scanning
scan.description: Quickly capture room dimensions with your smartphone camera
scan.detailedDescription: Simply walk around your space with your phone camera. Our AI instantly identifies walls, doors, windows, and even detects room types based on fixtures and furniture.

generate.title: Instant Blueprint Generation
generate.description: Convert scans to professional floor plans in seconds
generate.detailedDescription: Our AI instantly converts your scan data into architectural-grade floor plans with standard notation, accurate measurements, and proper scaling.

customize.title: Custom Editing Tools
customize.description: Fine-tune and customize every aspect of your plans
customize.detailedDescription: Adjust walls, add furniture, change room types, and customize every detail with our easy-to-use editing tools that require no technical expertise.

export.title: Multi-Format Export
export.description: Export to CAD, PDF, 3D models and more
export.detailedDescription: Export your completed floor plans in multiple formats for use with any professional software or direct printing at architectural scale.

collaborate.title: Collaboration Suite
collaborate.description: Share and collaborate in real-time with team members
collaborate.detailedDescription: Share your plans with clients, contractors, or design partners. Everyone can view, comment, and suggest changes in real-time from any device.

demo.description: Transform any space into a professional blueprint in three simple steps.

step1.title: Scan Your Space
step1.description: Using your smartphone camera, simply walk around the room. Our AR technology tracks walls, openings, and fixtures in real-time.

step2.title: Generate Blueprint
step2.description: Plendoor's AI instantly converts your scan into a precise architectural floor plan with proper dimensions, notations, and details.

step3.title: Export & Share
step3.description: Customize as needed, then export your plans in multiple formats including PDF, CAD, or even 3D models for use in any project.

useCases.description: Plendoor adapts to any environment and serves a wide range of users with specialized needs.

homeRenovation.title: Home Renovation
homeRenovation.description: Create detailed plans of your existing space to share with contractors, designers, and architects. Save thousands on preliminary design work.

interiorDesign.title: Interior Design
interiorDesign.description: Instantly generate accurate floor plans that serve as the foundation for interior design projects. Seamlessly export to design software.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Enhance property listings with professional floor plans in minutes. Improve buyer interest and provide complete property information.

officePlanning.title: Office Space Planning
officePlanning.description: Quickly document existing office layouts and plan optimized configurations for collaboration, productivity, and social distancing.

retailOptimization.title: Retail Space Optimization
retailOptimization.description: Design optimal store layouts to maximize customer flow, product visibility, and sales area. Test different configurations digitally.

eventPlanning.title: Event Planning
eventPlanning.description: Create precise venue layouts for weddings, conferences, and events. Plan seating arrangements, stages, and service areas with accuracy.

benefits.benefit2: 50% discount on premium features for life

benefits.limitedSpots: Limited spots available for early access program

footer.description: Revolutionizing architectural floor plans with AI technology that makes professional blueprints accessible to everyone.
